items.title: Mariano's 30th / Chicago
items.heat_reason: deadline approaching (13 days), multiple unresolved actions
items.summary: Mariano turns 30 on March 19th. Plan is a 1-2 night backpacking trip somewhere warm (weekend of Mar 14-15), then Chicago for the birthday celebration. Flights to Chicago already booked (return leg from Japan routed through Chicago). Need to find a warm backpacking destination and sort gear. Camping near Chicago mentioned.
open_actions: Book flight from backpacking to Chicago

items.title: Japan Trip 2026
items.summary: Two-week trip with Dana, March 23 – April 7. Route: Osaka → Nara → Kyoto → Takayama → Tokyo. All flights and hotels booked. Now in activity planning phase. Also celebrating Dana's 30th during the trip.

items.title: Life Dashboard
items.heat_reason: heat decay (5 days since last mention)
items.summary: Personal life dashboard built in React + Vite + Tailwind + TypeScript. Deployed to GitHub Pages, semi-functional. Four widgets built: calendar embed, temporal bubble map (ECharts), context resume, city map mini. Currently updating working memory to feed real data into it.

items.title: Go Game Engine / ECS
items.heat_reason: heat decay (5 days since last mention)
items.summary: Building an ECS game engine on top of Ebitengine in Go. Intentionally avoiding LLMs — this is a Go learning exercise. Snake prototype already works, now migrating to ECS pattern.
open_actions: Get components correctly registered under entities
Correctly call entities with the right components
Create a system that edits entities based on their components

items.title: Cerebro
items.summary: Developer portal — a one-stop shop connecting communication and platform info for engineers. Currently parked until it's running locally.

items.title: Fountain Pen Research
items.summary: Researching fountain pens for the Japan trip. Leaning toward Sailor Pro Gear Slim for the limited editions tied to being in Tokyo. Also looking for ~$100 pens for siblings and dot grid disc journal paper for fountain pens.
open_actions: Find good dot grid fountain pen pen paper

items.title: Dana's 30th Birthday
items.summary: Dana turns 30 this Saturday. Laser tag with a bigger group, organized with her best friend Shar. Drinks, food, yellow Jell-O shots. Gift already bought.

calendar_events.title: Online Consultation & Diagnosis (Regine Blaise PMHNP)
calendar_events.description:
Client Time zone: America/New_York 

Change Appointment: https://portal.getmindfulhealth.com



Thanks for scheduling an appointment with ✌️Mindful. Set aside 25 minutes for the appointment.

Please check your email for a booking confirmation and next steps to complete the medical intake form. This is required to confirm your appointment.
